00043         template<typename Tret, typename Tparam> Tret operator()(Tparam arg) const
00044         {
00045             if (!_fn().TypeCheck(TypeID<Tret>(),TypeID<Tparam>()))
00046             {
00047                 throw Exceptions::TypeMismatch();
00048             }
00049             _context.ManyArgs=MkConvert(arg);
00050             MetaInfo ifo(_state, _context);
00051             if (TypeID<Tret>()==TypeID<NO_RETURN>())
00052             {
00053                 _fn().Call(ifo, any(arg));
00054                 return Nothing;
00055             }
00056             else return any_cast<Tret>(_fn().Call(ifo, any(arg)));
00057         }
00063         template<typename Tret, typename Tparam> Tret Call(Tparam arg) const
00064         {
00065             return operator()<Tret>(arg);
00066         }
00072         template<typename Tret> Tret operator()(many args) const
00073         {
00074             _context.ManyArgs=MkConvert(args);
00075             MetaInfo ifo(_state, _context);
00076             return any_cast<Tret>(_fn().Call(ifo, args));
00077         }

00084         {
00085             return operator()<Tret>(args);
00086         }
